Package ristretto.problem.fs.subset.supervised

Class FSSubsetSupervisedProblem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ec.Problem
      • ristretto.problem.fs.subset.FSSubsetProblem
        • ristretto.problem.fs.subset.supervised.FSSubsetSupervisedProblem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ec.Prototype, ec.Setup, ec.simple.SimpleProblemForm, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FSSubsetSupervisedCoevolutionaryProblem
    public class FSSubsetSupervisedProblem
extends FSSubsetProblem
    Multi-objective wrapper for supervised (labeled) datasets solved using a subset of feature indices as individuals representation. The training data is split into two datasets, TR and VAL, according to the validation-prop parameter, and then, the following two objectives are maximized:

    • The Kappa index obtained with TR
    • The Kappa index obtained with VAL

    Parameters

    base.classifier
    Classifier    		 (the classifier to be used within the wrapper procedure)
    base.apply-lda
    boolean    		 (whether to apply LDA to the selected features before the classifier)
    base.validation-prop
    double > 0, < 1     		(Proportion of samples used for validation)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
